¤ Streptomycetaceae Waksman and Henrici 1943 (Approved Lists 1980), familia.

  

¤ Streptomycetales Cavalier-Smith 2002, ord. nov.

  

¤ Streptomycetes Cavalier-Smith 2002, class. nov.

  

¤ Streptomycineae Rainey et al. 1997 (complete authorship reads Rainey, Ward-Rainey and Stackebrandt), subord. nov.

  

¤ Streptosporangiaceae Goodfellow et al. 1990, fam. nov.

  

¤ Streptosporangiales Goodfellow et al. 2015, ord. nov.

  

¤ Streptosporangineae Ward-Rainey et al. 1997 (complete authorship reads Ward-Rainey, Rainey and Stackebrandt), subord. nov.

  

¤ Streptosporangium Couch 1955 (Approved Lists 1980), genus.
